answers.answer: I'd start getting stuff ready just so you aren't stressed out about getting a ton done before the induction if doc chooses to induce early.  You can put the items aside for the hospital bag and then when it's time you can throw them into a bag.  Give you a little peace of mind.  That's just me though.

Don't want to scare you, but my friend went in for her routine checkup and got admitted with preeclampsia and had her baby yesterday at 33 weeks. She wasn't showing any symptoms other than a headache she thought was a sinus headache. She had nothing packed yet. You have more done than she did! It isn't a bad idea to have it just in case cuz you never know!

Thats another thing i am afraid of!! My blood pressure has been steadily high for over a week ranging anywhere from 148/92 to 156/98 and ive been getting headaches as well. :( i had pre eclampsia with my first but it wasnt caught until 37 weeks when i had gained 13 lbs in one week because of swelling.

question: I am 32+1 measuring at 33. This appt thursday is another ultrasound to check babys growth and will tell us if she needs to be delivered early. I dont have my bag packed the bassinet washed the carseat cleaned up. Only baby clothes are washed.Should i get it done before this appt or is it still too soon?
title: 32 weeks too soon to pack hospital bag??
